description.lang: Command Center of the system. Works together with the App to control the Sensor Network.Instant Plug and Play Setup - New Sensors set-up simply by turning them on. The Hub seeksthem out and adds them to the Home NetworkRemote Firmware Upgrades - Hub receives automatic upgrades with new features and fixesfrom the Cloud with little or no user involvementNetwork Control - Works with most leading Home Automation network devicesZ-Wave+ Certification ensures the highest level of Security Encryption in Wireless CommunicationBattery Back-up - Can run for 4 hours on 4 Ni-MH Rechargeable Batteries when power is out1 Year limited Warranty
